name: Escape The Vanapagan
description:
The story of the game is that the main character was wandering around in the woods until he found an old wooden house. He went in closer to inspect it and saw treasures beyond belief. So he snuck in and before he knew it the door had shut tight behind him and locked permanently.

The goal of the game is for you to wander around in an old wooden house looking for treasure while being hunted down by the owner of that house. To win the game you have to find all of the treasure before Vanapagan (Old Devil) captures you.
